Title: 15 Minutes With
Tagline: Meet one of the freelance stylists in Berlin
ChatText: we met caroline for a walk in berlin.
IntroText: The French Caroline Lemblé is currently living in Berlin together with her dog Lou. In the past, she has worked for Harper’s Bazaar, Interview and L’Officiel and is now a freelance stylist. Her impressive resumé is an homage to her hard work, dedication and love for fashion.

LeftQuestion.question: What does time mean to you?
LeftQuestion.answer: Time is very precious to me. Often we don’t have enough and hurry from one appointment to the next. It’s important to make time for the people that matter.

LeftQuestion.question: Who or what is the essence of beauty to you?
LeftQuestion.answer: Beauty is carried in the heart. You can often see the good nature of people in their eyes. They always have this certain kind of warmth to them.

RightQuestion.question: What is your morning routine?
RightQuestion.answer: Cigarettes and coffee and then taking my dog Lou for a walk in my Pajamas.

RightQuestion.question: Favorite spot in Berlin?
RightQuestion.answer: Plänterwald forest – a beautiful small forest, 10 mins away from my apartment.

RightQuestion.question: On sundays I…
RightQuestion.answer: I don’t do anything on Sundays. I sleep in, don’t read any mails, no calls… dosing in bed and watching a good movie in the evening.

QuoteText: It’s important to make time for the people that matter.
Name: Caroline

CenterQuestion.question: what do you like to do when you have a day off?
CenterQuestion.answer: Coffee to go at the Pavillon and then a walk through the forest.

LeftQuestion.question: What’s your favorite memory?
LeftQuestion.answer: My childhood in Morocco, Loveparade in 2000, my university time at the Academy of Fashion and Design, and the vacations with my mother.

RightQuestion.question: Who or what inspired you in life and why?
RightQuestion.answer: My mom, she’s one of a kind and has always done her thing.

WatchSection.WatchText: The Tribeca in white – black, small and fashionable

LeftQuestion.question: What people do not know about you?
LeftQuestion.answer: I collect china figures, like an old grandma.

LeftQuestion.question: I’m always late/on time...
LeftQuestion.answer: I’m always on time. Why? Out of respect.

LeftQuestion.question: In five years time I…
LeftQuestion.answer: In five years... hopefully run a small hotel in Greece.

RightQuestion.question: Where would you want to be beamed to right this moment?
RightQuestion.answer: Mykonos, I have spent one of my best holidays there together with my best friend.

MainCloseImageText.QuoteText: I’m always on time. Why? Out of respect.
